item.title: Set Significant Letters in the Bar Plot in ggplot2
item.description: Problem As a biologist, one daily work is comparing the treatment and untreatment group and find if there are any significant difference. One common way is drawing a barplot with error bar and put the significant letters a little higher than the bar plot. Like a figure showing below: annotations for significant differences based on p value. Results are usually drawn in a barplot. For all variables with the same letter, the difference between the means is not statistically significant.
